8. I need an umbrella because. It is ...........right
now.​

Rudi is a junior high school student. He goes to SMP 13    everyday. He goes to school on foot (jalan kaki).
Rudi likes playing gootball and basket ball every week.
He never comes late to scholl. He always respects
(menghormati) and obeys (mematuhi) his parents and
teachers.
29. Who is Rudi?
a. A student
b. A teacher
c. A player
d. A football player

30. Where is he studying? 
a. SMP 12 c. SMP 14
b. SMP 13 d. A football player

31. How does he go to school?
a. By bisycle c. By bus
b. By car d. on foot 

32. Does he like basketball? 
a. Yes, he don't c. Yes, he does
b. Yes, he liket d. Yes, he did
​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

29. a. A student

30. b. SMP 3

31. d. On foot

32. c. Yes, he does

Penjelasan:

Semoga membantu..

Jawaban:

29. A. A Student

30. B. SMP 13

31. D. On Foot

32. C. Yes, He Does
